tooltip_text:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance

Blademaster Basic Attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Four Additional Attacks

Brawlers gain bonus Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Health

Basic Attacks from Demons have a @ManaDrainProcChance@% chance to reduce their target's Mana by @ManaDrainBurn@ and restore Mana to the Demon.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaDrainDrain@ Mana restored
<row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons gain @MagicReduction@% resistance to Magic Damage</row>

Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 Health to fight alongside your allies
<row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum Health</row>
(@MinUnits@) Basic Attacks from Glacials have a @ProcPercent@% chance to stun their target for @StunDuration@ seconds and do bonus Magic Damage.
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, Guardians grant +@Armor@ Armor to adjacent allies (this bonus can stack any number of times)</row>

Gunslinger Basic Attacks have a @ProcPercent@% chance to fire additional bullets at other enemies within range.

These bullets deal damage like Basic Attacks and apply on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies

At the start of combat, an ally Hextech launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for @DisableDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius
(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius

At the start of combat, select Imperials are empowered to deal double damage.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Imperial
(@MinUnits@) All Imperials

All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked

Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power

At the start of combat, select allies gain +@Armor@ Armor, +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance, and heal @Heal@ Health on-hit.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Ally
(@MinUnits@) All Allies
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random enemy's Health is set to @HPToSet@</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) At the end of each combat against another player, a treasure chest spawns on your arena containing up to 4 gold</row>

Every @ProcRate@ seconds, Rangers have a chance to gain Attack Speed for @ProcRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% chance for @ASMultTooltip@x Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full Mana

Shapeshifters gain bonus Maximum Health when they transform.

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health

Innate: Sorcerers gain double Mana from Basic Attacks.

All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) +@AP@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage.

Select allies' Basic Attacks are empowered to grant +@AttackSpeedPercent@% Bonus Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times).

(@MinUnits@) Wild Allies Only
(@MinUnits@) All Allies, and allies' basic attacks cannot be dodged.

Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Dodge

The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.

Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional @BaseValues*100@% Health and Damage Amp.

This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.

(@MinUnits@) Gain that Emissary's bonus
(@MinUnits@) Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth% and @SelfishDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Ambessa: Allies gain @AmbessaArmor@ Armor and Magic Resist for each opponent defeated. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Ambassador_PlayersDefeated@/7)

Garen: On Combat Start, Garen and allies to his left and right gain @GarenHealthPercent*100@% of his max Health.

Nami: Allies' attacks grant @NamiMana@ bonus Mana.

Tristana: Allies gain @StarAS*100@% Attack Speed per star level.

Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritDamage*100@% %i:scaleCritMult%

Warwick devours enemies that drop below @EnemyHealthPercentThreshold*100@% Health, healing him for @DevourHealing@ and granting him @ManaPerKill@ Mana.

Your team gains @TeamFlatHealth@ max Health. Bruisers gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%

(@MinUnits@) Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after @NumCastsToUnlock@ casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below @PercentHealthUnlock*100@% health.
(@MinUnits@) Sion grows stronger and his enemies take more damage from Black Rose units.
(@MinUnits@) Sion unleashes dark magic and heals to full Health when freed.
(@MinUnits@) When Sion dies, he restores to life with power beyond death!

Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power

Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.

(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @MinBonusAS*100@-@MaxBonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS%. On target death, Quickstrikers dash to a new target and gain @ShieldAmount@ shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least @MinStreakLength@, gain more.

At each stack of @ShimmerBreakpoint@ Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.

(@MinUnits@) @ShimmerPerCombat@ or @ShimmerPerCombatStreaking@; @HealthPerSkip@ %i:scaleHealth%

Markets Skipped: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Crime_PassedMarkets@
Current Health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_Crime_CurrentHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%

Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.

Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

(@MinUnits@) @NumLaboratory@ Laboratories, @MaxHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @NumLaboratory@ Laboratories, @MaxHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%

Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, @DamageReduction*100@% %i:scaleDR%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, @AttackSpeed*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @ManaReduction*100@% reduction, heist on topside! After combat, progress the heist, increased for each surviving Family member!

@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_JunkerKing_SelfDestructTRA@

Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.

Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

(@MinUnits@) @DR*100@% %i:scaleDR% or @DA*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At @TriggerNumCrystals@ crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + @ConversionDamagePct*100@% of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ damage, @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

When casting, Sevika rolls a random Jinx modification to her Ability and gains @Durability*100@% Durability for @Duration@ seconds.

Mods:
-Rocket: Launch @Bonus1NumRockets@ rockets that deal @Bonus1RocketDamage@ physical damage each
-Shield: Gain @Bonus2ShieldAmount@ Shield for @Bonus2ShieldDuration@ seconds
-Coin: Gain @Bonus4Gold@ gold
-Triple: Enhance her rolled ability!

In Choncc's Treasure, the Coin modification grants less gold in earlier stages.

Every @Duration@ seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageTakenHeal*100@% of damage taken. While dashing, gain a massive burst of Attack Speed.

Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, @APPercent*100@% %i:scaleAP%

Rounds Until Upgrade: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT13_JunkerKing_RoundsUntilOpening@

Viktor has a fixed Attack Speed of @AS@ attacks per second and converts ALL bonus Attack Damage, Attack Speed, and Mana into Ability Power.

Instead of Mana, Viktor gains 1 Chaos Energy every attack and casts when he has @MaxMana@.

Afterwards, Mel permanently gains @ProcDamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp.

(2x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): +1 free reroll / round.

(4x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Fire rockets @RocketRatePerLevel*100@% more often per player level.
(5x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Fire the Planet Cracker.

Damage this champion deals contributes @Percent*100@% more towards launching rockets from The Crew's ship.

At combat start go ALL OUT, gaining @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction and @AD*100@% Attack Damage. Health no longer decays while ALL OUT.
Gain @BaseDA@% Damage Amp, increased to @IncreasedDA@% Damage Amp after the first takedown each combat.
Every 4th attack deals @IncreasedDamage*100@% more damage. Overkill damage bounces to the nearest enemy.
Store @PercentMaxHealthInitial@% max Health at combat start and @PercentMaxHealthPerSecond@% more every second. On death, deal the stored Health as magic damage in a large radius.

Gain @BaseAD*100@% Attack Damage. All other sources of Attack Damage give @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_AttackExpert.1:PctBonusAD@% more.
Ekko's spell prioritizes the closest enemy, but he heals @HealPercent*100@% Max Health on cast and deals @BonusDamagePerAttack*100@% more magic damage each time his spell hits the target.
This unit is a Mentor. They grant @Defenses@ Armor and @Defenses@ Magic Resist, and at Mentor 4 they gain @Durability*100@% Durability instead of upgrading their spell.
When granting or receiving shields, add @PercentDamage*100@% of the shield's value as bonus physical damage on the next attack.
